verbose_text: A number of proteins are known targets of ROCK phosphorylation, however the most studied include regulation of actin-myosin contraction via an inhibitory phosphorylation of the myosin binding subunit (MBS) of myosin phosphatase [XREF_BIBR] and regulation of actin polymer stability via inhibition of LIMK2 / cofilin mediated actin severing [XREF_BIBR].
